tool_description: The API provides a simple endpoint that allows you to retrieve used prices of gpus on ebay. These prices are refreshed weekly automatically so you can have confidence these are up to date.
name: Used GPU Pricing
title: Used GPU Pricing

api_list.name: Get Prices
api_list.description: Retrieves used prices of all GPUs, the following prices are in USD.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://used-gpu-pricing1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "used-gpu-pricing1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://used-gpu-pricing1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "used-gpu-pricing1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
